component.name: Laerdal SimServer Imager
component.summary: Laerdal SimServer imaging utility for SimPad and SimMan devices

description.p: Laerdal SimServer Imager is a tool for writing operating system images to SD cards for Laerdal SimPad and SimMan medical simulation devices.
The utility downloads images directly from Laerdal's servers and writes them straight to the SD card, simplifying the imaging process.
During this process, the imager caches downloaded images locally, so you can program additional SD cards without having to download the file again.
